    • Constructor Detail

      • ResponseCookie

        public ResponseCookie(java.lang.String _name,
                      java.lang.String _value,
                      java.lang.String _domain,
                      java.lang.String _path)
        Creates a new instance of this class with the given attributes. The created cookie has no expiration time (a session cookie), has both the HttpOnly and Secure attributes set.
        Parameters:
        _name - the name of this cookie
        _value - the value of this cookie (which must not have any invalid characters in it)
        _domain - the domain this cookie applies to
        _path - the path this cookie applies to (within the given domain)

    • Method Detail

      • setLifetimeSeconds

        public void setLifetimeSeconds(long _lifetime)
        Sets the lifetime of this cookie. For maximum compatibility, this results in both the expiration date/time and the maximum age attributes being set.
        Parameters:
        _lifetime - the lifetime of this cookie, in seconds
